info.name: Bellamybug's Sleek Dark Theme
info.description: A light, simplified dark theme for Pokemon Showdown. See anything looking weird? Feel free to send me a PM on Showdown (username is Bellamybug). Enjoy.
info.additionalInfo: It is recommended you install the Helvetica Neue font for an optimal viewing experience. It's not required, but it'll make the skin look much nicer. I installed mine here (no malware, I promise) - http://www.freefontsdownload.net/free-helveticaneue-font-74318.htm
